description: Key events and developments during the Renaissance period

events.name: Leonardo da Vinci Born
events.description: Birth of Leonardo da Vinci, Renaissance polymath and artist who epitomized the Renaissance ideal

events.name: Columbus Reaches the Americas
events.description: Christopher Columbus lands in the Bahamas, beginning European exploration and colonization of the Americas

events.name: Sistine Chapel Ceiling Completed
events.description: Michelangelo completes painting the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel, one of the greatest works of Renaissance art

events.name: Luther Posts 95 Theses
events.description: Martin Luther posts his 95 Theses, sparking the Protestant Reformation and religious transformation of Europe

events.name: Gutenberg Bible Printed
events.description: Johannes Gutenberg completes printing the first major book using movable type, revolutionizing communication

events.name: Copernicus Publishes Heliocentric Theory
events.description: Nicolaus Copernicus publishes 'De revolutionibus', proposing that the Earth revolves around the Sun
